#include <iostream>
#include <map>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        map<string,int> a;
        while(n--)
        {
            string userid;
            char vote;
            cin>>userid>>vote;
            switch(vote)
            {
            case '-':
                a[userid] = -1;
                break;
            case '+':
                a[userid] = 1;
                break;
            }
        }
        map<string,int>::iterator it = a.begin(),end = a.end();
        int sum=0;
        while(it!=end)
        {
            sum += (it->second);
            ++it;
        }
        cout<<sum<<endl;
    }
}
